医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究表明，初级保健提供者与医院和私募股权的隶属关系增加布朗大学公共卫生学院的研究人员的一项研究表明，美国所有初级保健提供者（PCP）中有将近一半隶属于医院，而与私募股权公司有关联的PCP数量正在增长并集中在某些地区市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-reveals-rising-afrising-afrisiation-farmary-care-providers-with-hospitals-private-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-reveals-rising-rising-afrisiation-farmary-care-providers-primary-care-providers-hospitals-private-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1E9945B-3707-48C7-A001-A001-133437929FCF Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:34:23 -0500 Study reveals rising affiliation of primary care providers with hospitals and private equity
开创性研究揭示了与食物耐受性有关的关键肠道细胞我们服用的每一口食物，我们的肠道免疫系统必须做出重大决定。这些精致敏感的细胞以捍卫我们免受异物病原体的侵害，以某种方式将朋友与破坏敌人的入侵者区分开来，同时耐受食物和有用的细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/groundBreaking-Research-reveals-key-gut-gut-cells-cells-involved-involved-involved-in-food-tolerance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/groundBreaking-Research-reveals-key-gut-gut-cells-cells-involved-involved-in-folved-in-food-tolerance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=844fce29-D51D-4484-A478-CC2F1B45F4CA Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:30:07 -0500 Groundbreaking research reveals key gut cells involved in food tolerance
第4阶段乳腺癌中无症状的脑转移需要重新评估筛查指南莫菲特癌症中心研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，在4期乳腺癌患者中，无症状的脑转移比以前认为的更为常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/asmpompastic-brain-metastasis-in-stage-4-breast-cancer-cancer-requires-requires-requires-requirevaluation-screening-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/asmptomatic-brain-metastasis-in-stage-4-breast-cancer-cancer-requires-requires-requires-requires-requires-requirevaluation-screening-guidelines.aspx#Comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AB322110-36FE-4394-84B5-DE218490C1D0 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:20:24 -0500 Asymptomatic brain metastasis in stage 4 breast cancer requires reevaluation of screening guidelines
研究表明，长期大麻使用干扰关键的大脑过程大量大麻的使用与关键认知区域的大脑激活减少有关，尤其是在工作记忆任务期间，而最近的使用可能会导致暂时的认知障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-shows-nows-long-term-cannabis-use-disrupts-critical-critical-brain-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-shows-nows-long-term-cannabis-use-disrupts-critical-critical-brain-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48f14344-5329-45A8-96B6-D611E311E309779E Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:27:00 -0500 Study shows long-term cannabis use disrupts critical brain processes
在北美确定的第一个HENIPAVIRUS昆士兰州大学的研究人员已经确定了北美的第一个Henipavirus。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/first-henipavirus-isendisified-in-north-america.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/first-henipavirus-isendisified-in-north-america.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d80cd78c-4789-4EA9-4EA9-86C7-8BC00838CEC7 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:25:01 -0500 First henipavirus identified in North America
微生物化合物为白癜风治疗提供了希望据报道，源自肠道友好型细菌的天然化合物显着减慢了白癜风的进展并可能恢复色素沉着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/microbial-compounders-formers-hope-for-for-vitiligo-wartment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/microbial-compounders-formers-hope-for-for-vitiligo-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78032588-59E0-4081-BC16-3E6C36FFFE193 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:18:19 -0500 Microbial compound offers hope for vitiligo treatment
用新技术生长的T细胞提供更好的癌症防御匹兹堡大学的研究人员开发了一种新的方法来在实验室中种植T细胞，使其能够在黑色素瘤小鼠模型中寿命更长，更好地破坏癌细胞，而在传统生长培养基中生长的癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/t-cells-rown--new-new-new-technique-offer-better-better-cancer-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/t-cells-rown--new-new-technique-new-technique-ferfer-better-better-cancer-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54951B7C-B2C6-4E4E-8185-1350A550F548 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:13:29 -0500 T cells grown with new technique offer better cancer defense
新系统使用声波精确地分离肿瘤细胞据世界卫生组织称，癌症在2020年造成了近1000万人的死亡，几乎每六人中几乎每六人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/new-system-uses-uses-acoustic-waves-to-separate-to-separate-tumor-cells-with-precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/new-system-system-uses-acoustic-waves-to-separate-to-separate-tumor-cells-cells-with-precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=169b8ae2-2A64-418B-BEA1-A2E44BEC61F1 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:08:08 -0500 New system uses acoustic waves to separate tumor cells with precision
为什么2型糖尿病患者不仅需要血糖监测近一半的2型糖尿病患者患有微量营养素缺乏症，其中维生素D和镁是最常见的，突出了糖尿病护理中的关键差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/why-type-2-diabetes-patients-patients-more-more-than-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-blood-sugar-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/why-type-2-diabetes-patients-patients-more-more-than-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-just-blood-sugar-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f25ec85-343c-44c9-acc7-5588704af824 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:02:00 -0500 Why Type 2 diabetes patients need more than just blood sugar monitoring
NHS引入了基因测试，以帮助减少黑人捐助者的肾衰竭风险现在，英国的黑人非洲和黑人加勒比海遗产的数百个潜在的肾脏供体现在可以进行简单的血液检查，以帮助降低肾衰竭的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/nhs-intrododuces-genetic-test-te-to-to-help-reduce-kidney-failure-failure--for-for-black-black-donors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/nhs-introduces-genetic-test-to-to-to-help-reduce-kidney-failure-failure--for-for-black-for-black-donors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79E359AF-909D-4F6D-95CD-0E1A73965671 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 19:55:00 -0500 NHS introduces genetic test to help reduce kidney failure risk for black donors
